affirmation_List.affirmation: I am capable of achieving my goals and dreams.
I am worthy of love and respect.
I choose to focus on the positive in my life.
I am confident in my abilities.
I am grateful for all the blessings in my life.
I trust in the universe to guide me towards my highest good.
I am deserving of success and abundance.
I am strong and resilient.
I am at peace with myself and the world around me.
I choose to let go of negative thoughts and emotions.
I am constantly growing and improving.
I am an important and valuable part of this world.
I am surrounded by love and support.
I am open to new opportunities and experiences.
I am in control of my thoughts and emotions.
I am worthy of forgiveness and second chances.
I am capable of creating a happy and fulfilling life for myself.
I am surrounded by abundance and prosperity.
I am grateful for my body and all that it does for me.
I am worthy of all the good things life has to offer.
